solution_line_template: The number of blocks in each walk around the neighborhood is {blocks_to_park} blocks + {blocks_to_high_school} blocks + {blocks_to_home} blocks = <<{blocks_to_park}+{blocks_to_high_school}+{blocks_to_home}={blocks_per_walk}>>{blocks_per_walk}.
Ray's dog walks {walks_per_day} walks * {blocks_per_walk} blocks/walk = <<{walks_per_day}*{blocks_per_walk}={total_blocks_per_day}>>{total_blocks_per_day} blocks each day.
